revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Open Source DIY Box |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Khadas |model = Edge |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Pro |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3399; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.4 / 2.0 GHz --> |cpu1spd2 = 1.5 GHz<!-- 1.4 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;25Q128FWPM; |flash1size = 16 |flash2type = eMMC 5.1 |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Samsung;KLMBG2JETD-B041; |flash2size = 32 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNBPUML-849A; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211FD; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C8:63:14 |oui = 18:93:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.167;Android 9;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0 (Type A), USB 3.0 (Type C), |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB (Type C)
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5.0, HDMI 2.0a, WoL, GPIO, LiPo battery connector, RTC, |addchip = 8-bit MCU, 8-Kbyte Flash memory, 128-byte data EEPROM;ST;STM8S003;;1;,,, Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK808-D;;1;,,, Fixed 5V-8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, Fixed 3.3V-8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB680;;1;,,, 5.5V, 6A, 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR838;;1;,,, 5.5V, 6A, 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR837;;1;,,, 1.5A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8030DEC;;2;,,, 300mA, Low Power, Low Dropout, RF Linear Regulator;SG Micro;SGM2036;;3;,,, 28V, Over-Voltage, Over-Current Protection Load Switch;ON Semi;FPF2595;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;6;,,, Adjustable Current Power Distribution Switch;SG Micro;SGM2551A;;2;,,, Programmable USB Type-C Controller w/PD;ON Semi;FUSB302;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Shenzhen Wesion Tech |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Ubuntu, LibreELEC,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/2019 |estprice = 149 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07T6ZPQ2Y |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6398S |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399 @1.8GHz (6 cores), GPU: Mali-T860MP4 (ARM) :SoC: x2 (ARM Cortex-A72) @1.8GHz, x4 (ARM Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz :4K VP9, 4K 10-bits H265/H264; 4GB RAM (LPDDR4), 32GB eMMC 5.1 *WLAN: [[AMPAK]] [https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan805/ AP6398S] • [[Broadcom]] BCM43598 • [http://www.sparklan.cn/p2-products-detail.php?PKey=225cqiWkYCWVaSu-luPjsPhzPvIQ4mR7Dlk4USmpn9s&AP6398S Spec.] :802.11abgn/ac 2T2R Wi-Fi + BT 5.0 SiP Module :Wi-Fi: SDIO 3.0/2.0, BT: UART/PCM interface :Bluetooth 5.0 BLE, GFSK, DQPSK, 8DPSK *Power supply (FC57 model) supports: :DC output: 5V/3A, 9V/2.67A, and 12V/2A
==Links of Interest== [https://www.khadas.com/edge-1] {{•}} [https://docs.khadas.com/edge/ Documentation]
===Wikis=== * [https://forum.khadas.com/c/Khadas-Edge Khadas Community] ===Source=== *[https://github.com/khadas GitHub] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/11/13/khadas-edge-pro-developer-package-review-captain-edge-io-boards/ ''Khadas Edge Developer Package Review'' on '''CNXSoft'''] *[https://forum.xda-developers.com/android-stick--console-computers/rockchip/khadas-edge-entirely-sbc-concept-love-t3832751 ''Khadas Edge, an entirely new SBC concept if you love to Tinker'' on '''xda developers'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2018/11/khadas-edge-is-a-hacker-friendly-single-board-pc-and-ecosystem-crowdfunding.html ''Khadas Edge is a hacker-friendly single-board PC'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/three-open-spec-rk3399-sbcs-go-on-sale-including-an-ai-enabled-model/ ''Three open-spec RK3399 SBCs go on sale'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
